comment: She is a very strange person to say the least, but she is a very sweet lady. Class is not mandatory which is good because classes are so boring. There are 3 tests and 2 little projects. All are easy! Take her if you are looking for and easy A for the KSU class.

Very nice teacher. She is a very interesting person, and you will enjoy her. Put forth some effort on the assignments and you should get an A! go to class because she takes it into consideration when grading you on participation and stuff. Tests are not very easy. Read the material and pay attention in class! Easy class, really enjoyed her!

This class was a waste of my time.  The teacher had a temper and went off on boring tangents about trivial things.  I never really went to class because it was pointless.  She treats the students like were ignorant and naive.  Did not enjoy at all.

She is a good professor. She doesn't remind you of due dates, but very lenient with late work. Her lectures are hard to pay attention to. You'll get an A if you turn everything in, and go to class regularly. Really really really easy class.
does not use webct at all so it is hard to know when stuff is due unless you are in class every day. sweet lady. hard to get into contact with.

She's a very interesting/nice lady. I enjoyed her enthusiasm for teaching us, but was kind of bored in class. She was a little scatter-brained and unorganized at times, but it was pretty fun getting stories out of her.

I had classes with Professor Cohen almost 10 years ago and have moved on to work within the Communications/PR field.  I still think about the lessons she taught me daily and apply what I learned in her classes in numerous ways.  She was not only extremely smart, but a great friend as well.  I won't ever forget that I've succeeded because of her.

This teacher is so sweet and awesome. She tells a lot of interesting stories and relates them to the material in class. We had a few journals to write which she usually gave us more time for. The tests were all easy, I made As on all of them. She is a very nice and helpful teacher. Would definitely recommend her!

Ms. Cohen is a very nice teacher. However, her class schedule/syllabus is a bit unclear. She can be unorganized. She is willing to help if you ask her. She is very enthusiastic about teaching this terrible class which makes it kind of annoying. Overall, she's not that bad...you might even get a few good stories out of her.
Amazing teacher! Is willing to help you with anything and everything.

I am currently attending another university in a different state, and I only wish I could have brought Prof. Cohen with me. She is the nicest lady and best professor I've ever had. Very understanding as well- She let me make up assignments I had miss while dealing with personal issues. Take her for a teacher! You won't regret it.

Nice lady who doesn't take a lot of crap. Lets you rewrite papers,which is nice seeing that she grades tough. She isnt very organized and it is easy to get lost in her class. If you like spontaneity take her, if you cant stand unorganized profs. Cohen isnt for you.
Is a wonderful teacher... really cares for the material. Best of all, she gives you a chance to rewrite your papers!

Marsha Cohen is a fantastic woman and professor. You know that she is interested in what she is teaching, and she loves her students. Prof. Cohen knows her stuff, and she wont let you slack by any means, but she is just awesome. Absolutely awesome. I wish
Wonderful easy class because she is so helpful, understanding, and easy to talk to!!!
Best teacher I've ever had!!!!!

She was a great teacher. She is one of the best teachers I have had here at KSU. Although sometimes she can get a little unorganized, She will work with you to make sure you understand and she gives out candy to keep you awake in class. Work with her and you will learn and have fun.
She made the class fun.  She gave several projects and group assignments.  Take home tests too.
No Comments
For the class I cared about least, I did the most work preparing for.

Fun Teacher.  T/F,Mult. Ch./Short Answ. Tests can be confusing.  Test strategy: Read the Book 2 times, take notes, and hope for the best.  Her notes are all over the place.  Easy "A" or "B" with group work, speaker evaluation, and oral
She's great! I learned so much from her. She will definitely make you a better writer.
Pretty awesome. Class is a lot of work, but she's great
